title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper. Creamy, rich, and ready in just 20 minutes.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy. Serve with naan or rice.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Crusty sourdough bread topped with creamy mashed avocado, red pepper flakes, and a drizzle of olive oil. Perfect for breakfast.

title: Beef Burger
summary: Juicy grass-fed beef patty with melted cheddar, crisp lettuce, tomato, and our secret sauce on a brioche bun.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Crisp romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, crunchy croutons, and creamy Caesar dressing. A timeless classic.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
summary: Warm, individual chocolate cakes with a gooey molten center. Served best with vanilla ice cream.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: Traditional Neapolitan pizza with San Marzano tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, basil, and extra virgin olive oil.

title: Thai Green Curry
summary: Aromatic coconut curry with bamboo shoots, bell peppers, Thai basil, and your choice of chicken or tofu.

title: Blueberry Pancakes
summary: Fluffy buttermilk pancakes loaded with fresh blueberries and topped with maple syrup.

title: Grilled Salmon
summary: Perfectly grilled Atlantic salmon with lemon butter sauce, served with seasonal vegetables.
